title: Poster, 1963–64
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed: Upper left along edge in red-brown ink: Entwurf: A. Hofmann Photo: Max Mathys  Druck: Wassermann AG
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: A large black and white photographic montage of five hands gesturing in a strong raking light against a solid black background.  At left center in large red-brown numbers, the date of the production, 63/64, and in sans serif letters the name of STADT / THEATER / BASEL, alligned with a left justification.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, 1963–64.
1963–64. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-143.
